projectGridLines.title: EPR (Extended producer responsibility) guidelines for plastic packaging and implementing the same for our bigger divisions
projectGridLines.description:
Title: EPR (Extended producer responsibility) guidelines for plastic packaging and implementing the same for our bigger divisions

Description:

Skill sets: very good with exposure to EPR and LCA

Traits expectation: analysis of the plastic packaging, looking at the guidelines, working with multiple stakeholders to ensure clear initiatives are agreed upon and initiated for action

Expected learning:

Specific courses required for project execution: B.E Chemical Engineering / Environment Engineering
